parameters.name: BackupDbNames
parameters.description: The name of the database involved in the backup.

parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup set.

parameters.name: BackupLevel
parameters.description:
The level of the backup. Valid values:

*   **DB**: The database Level
*   **instance **: instance level

parameters.name: BackupMode
parameters.description: The backup mode. Valid values: **logic** or **phy**.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance for which to modify the backup policy.
